job.name: Energy_Consumption_Analysis
job.description: Analysis of energy consumption for a sample of London Households using ELK. You can use the following pre-made dashboard to visualize the results in Kibana : https://s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/activeeon-public/ELK/energy_consumption_kibana.json

task.name: Wait_For_Stop_Validation
task.description: Task to pause the job and send a validation message to the notification service

argument.value: Please, validate to stop the ELK Stack services

task.name: Start_Elasticsearch_Service
task.description: Start the Elasticsearch server as a service.

task.name: Start_Logstash_Service
task.description: Start the Logstash server as a service.

task.name: Start_Kibana_Service
task.description: Start the Kibana server as a service.

task.name: Configure_Logstash
task.description: The simplest task, ran by a python engine.

script.code:
echo "=================BEGIN_CONFIGURE_LOGSTASH=================="
CONTAINER=$variables_logstash_instance_name DATA_URL=$variables_DATA_URL
docker exec $CONTAINER /bin/bash -c "cd usr/share/logstash/config && mkdir -p energy" docker exec $CONTAINER /bin/bash -c "cd /usr/share/logstash/config/energy && rm -f energy_consumption_logstash.conf && wget https://s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/activeeon-public/ELK/energy_consumption_logstash.conf" docker exec $CONTAINER /bin/bash -c "cd /usr/share/logstash/config/energy && wget $DATA_URL" docker exec $CONTAINER /bin/bash -c "cd /usr/share/logstash/config/energy && logstash -f energy_consumption_logstash.conf"
echo "=================END_CONFIGURE_LOGSTASH=================="

metadata.visualization:
Wait_For_Stop_Validation
 Start_Elasticsearch_Service
 Start_Logstash_Service
 Start_Kibana_Service
 Configure_Logstash
 Finish_Kibana_Service
 Finish_Logstash_Service
 Finish_Elasticsearch_Service
